short_summary: IT helpdesk service tool for Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC)
description: IRCC manages several official social media accounts, and regularly interacts with stakeholders (clients, prospective applicants, representatives, Canadians, etc.) on these social media channels. The Department's Social Media team responds to over 1,000 questions from IRCC clients on a weekly basis via social media and is seeking to expand on the extent of the client service it offers. IRCC's Communications Branch has a requirement for a commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) solution for a Helpdesk Tool that will enable IRCC users to effectively and efficiently manage IRCC’s interactions with the public via its official social media channels. The solution will consist of licenses, standard upgrades and fixes to the solution as they become available, and the provision of technical support to IRCC users.

## Helpdesk Service Tool Tender
### Solicitation Number: CIC-155593
#### Provisioning Category: SRV
#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
#### Solicitation Status: Expired
#### Tender Status: Expired

#### Overview

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is seeking a Helpdesk Service Tool to manage its social media interactions and client inquiries. The Department has a requirement for a commercial-off-the-shelf (COTS) solution that will enable IRCC users to effectively and efficiently manage interactions with the public via its official social media channels.

#### Mandatory Requirements

* The solution must possess the following minimum requirements: 
* Licenses, standard upgrades, and fixes to the solution as they become available
* Provision of technical support to IRCC users
* Implementation in English and French for an initial batch of 25 users across IRCC’s branches in National Headquarters (NHQ)
* Potential expansion to hundreds of users in IRCC NHQ in subsequent years
